message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it's a great deal and will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can work something out closer to my valuation of the product. How about $120?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet halfway at $135? It's a fair price considering its value.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, how about we settle at $125? It's a bit closer to what I'm comfortable spending.
